entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
